summary: Texan Tom Buchanan is heading back home with enough money to start his own ranch, but when he stops in the crooked town of Agry, he's robbed and framed for murder.
cast: Randolph Scott|Craig Stevens|Barry Kelley|Tol Avery|Peter Whitney|Manuel Rojas|L.Q. Jones|Robert Anderson|Joe De Santis|William Leslie|Jennifer Holden|Nacho Galindo|Richard Alexander|Bill Coontz|Tony Epper|Duke Fishman|Terry Frost|Don C. Harvey|Riley Hill|Barbara James|Roy Jenson|James B. Leong|David O. McCall|Charles Morton|Leo Ogletree|Frank J. Scannell|Al Wyatt Sr.
title: Buchanan cabalga de nuevo
